item.title: How to Install ADB
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: The Android Development Bridge (ADB) is a vital part of Android App development, along with Android modding. Learning how to install ADB can help you later down the line. ADB allows you to access your Android phone via USB and issue commands to it. This can be really helpful for flashing roms, automated scripts or if your device is inaccessibleÂ through the normal Android interface. For this tutorial, we are going to focus on how to install ADB on Windows.
